languages.text: "Вы бы этого хотели? А ты, Хейнрикс, хотел бы продолжить работу при достопочтенном Вольном Торговце?"

traits.locale_text: "А вы бы этого хотели? А ты, Хейнрикс, хотел бы продолжить работу про достопочтенном Вольном Торговце?"

languages.text: "Which would you prefer? And you, Heinrix — do you wish to continue working at the honourable Rogue Trader's side?"
languages.original_text: "Вы бы этого хотели? А ты, Хейнрикс, хотел бы продолжить работу при достопочтенном Вольном Торговце?"

traits.locale_text: "Which would you prefer? And you, Heinrix — do you wish to continue working at the honorable Rogue Trader's side?"
"Which would you prefer? And you, Heinrix — do you wish to continue working at the honorable Rogue Trader's side?"
"Which would you prefer? And you, Heinrix — do you wish to continue working at the honourable Rogue Trader's side?"
"Which would you prefer? And you, Heinrix — do you wish to continue working at the honourable Rogue Trader's side?"
"Which would you prefer? And you, Heinrix — do you wish to continue working at the honourable Rogue Trader's side?"

languages.text: 「どうしたいのだ、ハインリクス――栄誉ある自由開拓者のかたわらで仕事を続けたいか？」
languages.original_text: "Which would you prefer? And you, Heinrix — do you wish to continue working at the honourable Rogue Trader's side?"

traits.locale_text: 「どうしたいのだ、ハインリクス――栄誉ある自由開拓者のかたわらで仕事を続けたいか？」

languages.original_text: "Which would you prefer? And you, Heinrix — do you wish to continue working at the honourable Rogue Trader's side?"

languages.text: “你希望我怎么做呢？还有你，海因里希，你愿意继续留在这位受人尊敬的行商浪人身边吗？”
languages.original_text: "Which would you prefer? And you, Heinrix — do you wish to continue working at the honourable Rogue Trader's side?"

traits.locale_text: “你希望我怎么做呢？还有你，海因里希，你愿意继续留在这位受人尊敬的行商浪人身边吗？”

languages.text: «¿Qué preferiría? Y usted, Heinrix, ¿quiere continuar junto a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente?».
languages.original_text: "Which would you prefer? And you, Heinrix — do you wish to continue working at the honourable Rogue Trader's side?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué preferiría? Y usted, Heinrix, ¿quiere continuar junto a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente?».

languages.text: « Que préférez-vous ? Et vous, Heinrix, souhaitez-vous rester aux côtés de l'honorable {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ? »
languages.original_text: "Which would you prefer? And you, Heinrix — do you wish to continue working at the honourable Rogue Trader's side?"

traits.locale_text: « Que préférez-vous ? Et vous, Heinrix, souhaitez-vous rester aux côtés de l'honorable {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ? »

languages.text: "Was wäre Euch denn lieber? Und Ihr, Heinrix – möchtet Ihr weiterhin an der Seite {mf|des ehrenwerten Freihändlers|der ehrenwerten Freihändlerin} arbeiten?"
languages.original_text: "Which would you prefer? And you, Heinrix — do you wish to continue working at the honourable Rogue Trader's side?"

traits.locale_text: "Was wäre Euch denn lieber? Und Ihr, Heinrix – möchtet Ihr weiterhin an der Seite {mf|des ehrenwerten Freihändlers|der ehrenwerten Freihändlerin} arbeiten?"

languages.text: "Sen hangisini istersin? Ya sen Heinrix, onurlu Hür Tacir'in yanında çalışmaya devam etmek ister misin?"
languages.original_text: "Which would you prefer? And you, Heinrix — do you wish to continue working at the honourable Rogue Trader's side?"

traits.locale_text: "Sen nasıl tercih edersin? Peki ya sen Heinrix, onurlu Hür Tacir'in yanında çalışmaya devam etmek ister misin?"
